text: Yi Ui-bang (, ? - 1174) was a Korean Goryeo dynasty soldier and politician. He was the father-in-law of King Gangjong and grandfather of King Gojong. == Life == In 1170 Yi joined the Goryeo warrior rebellion. In 1174, he was murdered by Jeong Kyun. His younger brother Yi In was the ancestor of Yi Seonggye, the founder of the Joseon dynasty. == Other websites == * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=127558 * http://people.aks.ac.kr/front/tabCon/ppl/pplView.aks?pplId=PPL_5COb_A9999_1_0010319 * http://www.sanzoa.net/lee/gosa_13.htm * 리인 - 전주이씨 Category:Year of birth unknown Category:1174 deaths Category:Korean military people Category:Korean politicians
title: Yi Ui-bang
